StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecrui.ngPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT T.ID, T.Billet, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD, COALESCE(MC.GENDER_CODE, 'M') AS GENDER_CODE, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, R.RANK_CODE, M.BILLET_MOS, R.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, RR.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, O.ORGANIZATION_ID, O.Name Organiza.onName, O_PARENT.Name ParentOrganiza.onName, R.EMAIL_ADDRESS, R.ON_PRODUCTION, BRC.ClassNumber, BRC.GradDate FROM USMC.TrainingFile T LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarine M on T.RecruiterID = M.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissPerson AS P ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarineCandidate AS MC on MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson AS R on M.MARINE_ID = R.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS O ON O.ORGANIZATION_ID = R.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngRole AS RR on R.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = RR.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.BRC as BRC on T.BRCID = BRC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN mcriss.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP as OM on OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = R.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS O_PARENT ON O_PARENT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE T.ID = @TrainingFileId
END
